SEARCH
Package com.olegtoropoff.petcareappointment.service.veterinarian

Class VeterinarianService

java.lang.Object
com.olegtoropoff.petcareappointment.service.veterinarian.VeterinarianService
All Implemented Interfaces:
IVeterinarianService
@Service public class VeterinarianService extends Object implements IVeterinarianService
Service layer for managing operations related to veterinarians. Provides functionality to fetch, aggregate, and validate veterinarians and their appointments.

      private static final int MINIMUM_HOURS_FROM_NOW_FOR_APPOINTMENT
      The minimum number of hours from the current time required to book an appointment. Ensures that appointments are not booked too close to the current time.

    • mapVeterinarianToUserDto

      private UserDto mapVeterinarianToUserDto(Veterinarian veterinarian)
      Maps a Veterinarian entity to a UserDto object, including additional details such as average rating, total reviewers, and photo.

      Returns:

    • getAvailableVeterinarians

      private List<Veterinarian> getAvailableVeterinarians(String specialization, LocalDate date, LocalTime time)
      Retrieves a list of veterinarians filtered by specialization and availability for a given date and time.
      Parameters:
      specialization - the specialization to filter veterinarians.
      date - the requested appointment date.
      time - the requested appointment time.
      Returns:
      a list of available veterinarians matching the criteria.

    • isVetAvailable

      private boolean isVetAvailable(Veterinarian veterinarian, LocalDate requestedDate, LocalTime requestedTime)
      Checks if a veterinarian is available for an appointment on a specific date and time.
      Parameters:
      veterinarian - the veterinarian to check.
      requestedDate - the date of the requested appointment.
      requestedTime - the time of the requested appointment.
      Returns:
      true if the veterinarian is available; false otherwise.

    • doesAppointmentOverLap

      private boolean doesAppointmentOverLap(Appointment existingAppointment, LocalTime requestedStartTime, LocalTime requestedEndTime)
      Determines whether a new appointment time overlaps with an existing appointment's time.
      Parameters:
      existingAppointment - the existing appointment to compare against.
      requestedStartTime - the start time of the requested appointment.
      requestedEndTime - the end time of the requested appointment.
      Returns:
      true if the requested appointment overlaps; false otherwise.

      Aggregates veterinarians by their specialization.
      Specified by:
      aggregateVetsBySpecialization in interface IVeterinarianService

      a list of maps containing specialization and veterinarian count.

      Specified by:
      getAvailableTimeForBookAppointment in interface IVeterinarianService
      Parameters:
      vetId - the veterinarian's ID.
      date - the date to check availability.
      Returns:
